languages.text: "Мое почтение, комиссар. Отыскать вас было весьма непросто... учитывая участь ваших родителей и ваше взросление в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Наша встреча — настоящее провидение, не так ли?" {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, коммисар. Отыскать вас было весьма непросто... учитывая участь ваших родителей и ваше взросление в Схола Прогениум. Наша встреча — настоящее провидение, не так ли?" {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

languages.text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, комиссар. Отыскать вас было весьма непросто... учитывая участь ваших родителей и ваше взросление в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Наша встреча — настоящее провидение, не так ли?" {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

"My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly — either at you or to himself.{/n}

"My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

"My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

"My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，政委。鉴于您父母的命运，以及您在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}的成长经历，找到您真的是件非常困难的事情。我们的相遇，确实是拜命运所赐，您认为呢？”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，政委。鉴于您父母的命运，以及您在{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}的成长经历，找到您真的是件非常困难的事情。我们的相遇，确实是拜命运所赐，您认为呢？”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不太确定这个笑容是不是对你露出来的。{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, Comisari{mf|o|a}. No fue fácil encontrarl{mf|e|a}, dado el destino de sus padres y su educación en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Este encuentro es un auténtico acto de providencia, ¿no le parece?». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, Comisari{mf|o|a}. No fue fácil encontrarl{mf|e|a}, dado el destino de sus padres y su educación en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Este encuentro es un auténtico acto de providencia, ¿no le parece?». {n}Voigtvir esboza una sonrisa débil, pero no sabes si está dirigida a ti.{/n}

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、コミッサー。ご両親の運命と{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}で育てられたことを考えますと、あなたを見つけるのは困難な仕事でした。本当に私たちの出会いは摂理の産物と思いませんか？」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします、コミッサー。ご両親の運命と{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}で育てられたことを考えますと、あなたを見つけるのは困難な仕事でした。本当に私たちの出会いは摂理の産物ですね？」{n}ボイドヴィルは、かすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
「よろしくお願いします、コミッサー。ご両親の運命と{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}で育てられたことを考えますと、あなたを見つけるのは困難な仕事でした。本当に私たちの出会いは摂理の産物と思いませんか？」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the Schola Progenium. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: « Mes hommages, commissaire. Vous trouver n'a pas été une mince affaire au vu du sort de vos parents et de votre éducation au sein de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Notre rencontre est vraiment un miracle de la providence, vous ne trouvez pas ? » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, commissaire. Vous trouver n'a pas été une mince affaire au vu du sort de vos parents et de votre éducation au sein de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Notre rencontre est vraiment un miracle de la providence, vous ne trouvez pas ? » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, {mf|Kommissar|Kommissarin}. Euch zu finden, war eine schwierige Aufgabe, zumal angesichts des Schicksals Eurer Eltern und Eurer Erziehung in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Unser Zusammentreffen ist wahrhaft ein Akt der Vorsehung, findet Ihr nicht?" {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, {mf|Kommissar|Kommissarin}. Euch zu finden, war eine schwierige Aufgabe, zumal angesichts des Schicksals Eurer Eltern und Eurer Erziehung in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Unser Zusammentreffen ist wahrhaft ein Akt der Vorsehung, findet Ihr nicht?" {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Komiser. Ailenizin akıbeti ve {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium'da{/g} büyüdüğünüz düşünülürse sizi bulmak zorlu bir görev oldu. Karşılaşmamız takdiriilahi olsa gerek, haksız mıyım?" {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Commissar. Finding you was a difficult task, given your parents' fate and your upbringing in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}. Truly our meeting is an act of providence, is it not?" {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Komiser. Ailenizin akıbeti ve {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}'da büyüdüğünüz düşünülürse sizi bulmak zorlu bir görev oldu. Karşılaşmamız takdiriilahi olsa gerek, haksız mıyım?" {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsese de sana mı yönelttiğinden emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
